title: The Effect of Locomotor Training on Children With Incomplete Spinal Cord Injuries

operands.value: Children between the ages of 4-18 with incomplete ASIA C or D spinal cord injuries at least 12 months before study enrolment
Non-ambulatory or 'exercise only' ambulators with or without assistive devices
Normal motor and cognitive development up to time of injury
Must have minimum age of 4 Years
Must have maximum age of 18 Years
Contraindication to weight bearing on lower extremities
Pressure sores where harness would be applied
Lower limb contractures impeding range of motion necessary for ambulation
Prior enrolment in a BWATT program
Unable to commit to intervention for duration of protocol

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Children between the ages of 4-18 with incomplete ASIA C or D spinal cord injuries at least 12 months before study enrolment'), Symbol('Medical Stability'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 4 Years'), Symbol("Non-ambulatory or 'exercise only' ambulators with or without assistive devices"), Symbol('Normal motor and cognitive development up to time of injury'), Not(Or(Symbol('Contraindication to weight bearing on lower extremities'), Symbol('Lower limb contractures impeding range of motion necessary for ambulation'), Symbol('Other neuromuscular disease'), Symbol('Pressure sores where harness would be applied'), Symbol('Prior enrolment in a BWATT program'), Symbol('Unable to commit to intervention for duration of protocol'), Symbol('Uncontrollable hypotension when upright'))))
